channel.title: Posts on Leeds R Users
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Leeds R Users

item.title: To do list
item.description: We’re starting an R Users Group in Leeds, UK. The next thing we need to do to is start contacting potential speakers. If you know any R Users with something cool to share (including yourself!) please get in touch. To do Twitter account Website Email address Arrange speakers Meetup page Mailing list
